title: Step 49

challengeFiles.name: index
styles

tests.text: Your .cat-right-inner-eye selector should have a width set to 10px.
Your .cat-right-inner-eye selector should have a height set to 20px.
Your .cat-right-inner-eye selector should have a background-color set to #fff.

description: Using a class selector, give your .cat-right-inner-eye element a width of 10px and a height of 20px. Also, give it a background color of #fff.
